name: Younited Pay Payment Gateway
author: Younited

sections.description:
Overview

Instant credit solution built for purchases that matter, from €300 to €50.000. Offer your shoppers a way to pay at their own pace over 10 to 84 months.
Your payment is guaranteed, we take care of the rest.
What this module does for you

The best suited solution for important purchases

Don’t limit your shopping experience to payments over 3, 4 or 10 installments. Thanks to Younited Pay instant credit technology that is unique in Europe, your shoppers can now pay their purchases over time for all purchases that matter.
Whatever products you are selling: jewelry, swimming pools, electric scooters or solar panels ? Your shoppers will always find a solution that fit their budget, starting from 10€ monthly repayment.

Boost your sales

Up to 40% increase in Average Transaction Value (ATV)
Up to 20% increase in average conversion rate

Payment is guaranteed

You are paid upon the order confirmation and we take care of the rest (fraud attempts, repayment defaults, …)

Fast and easy subscription

Full customer journey in less than 5 minutes, whatever the basket amount.
The best UX on the market across lending solutions to optimize conversion rate and customer satisfaction

What your customers will like

Affordable monthly repayments to fit their budget even for expansive purchases, starting from 10€ per month.
An easy application journey with a maximum of 2 documents required (ID + proof of adress depending on the basket amount)
An immediate confirmation, no orders are left pending until the credit is granted, everything happens on the spot

Contributing

Translations

To edit the translations, use Poedit

  • Open the .pot file and click on Update from code, then save
  • Open the .po file and click on Update from code, add/update the translations, then save
sections.installation:
Prerequisites

You must create your account on younited.com.

Configuring the plugin

After installing the plugin, go to settings and activate the payment method.

Fill in the API keys for your account.

After you save your API keys, you\’ll have access to different settings to control what the plugin should display on the Product and Checkout pages.
We advise you to stay in \”Test\” mode until you\’re happy with your configuration and are ready to accept payments from your customers.

Once everything is properly set up, go ahead and switch to \”Live\” mode!
sections.changelog:
1.7.3

  • Compatibility WordPress 6.6

1.7.2

  • Fix for the best price of a product with default variations

1.7.1

  • Compatibility WordPress 6.5

1.7.0

  • WooCommerce Payment Block

1.6.0

  • Testing API keys from module settings

1.5.0

  • Refactoring code for submission ton woocommence

1.4.5

  • Be able to change order status if there is a desynchronization with the Younited contract

1.4.4

  • Compatibility with the plugin Pay for Payment for WooCommerce

1.4.3

  • After a contract has been validated by Younited (status processing), you can modify the order with the unofficial statuses.
  • If the completed or Canceled status is chosen, the order status is blocked.

1.4.2

  • Checkout – Fix for the first detail of payment

1.4.1

  • Plugin activation problem

1.4.0

  • Other display in the Checkout page if more than 3 maturities available

1.3.4

  • Update plugin Description
  • Detailed error log on api call for best price

1.3.3

  • Fix for plugin deployment

1.3.2

  • Fix for plugin deployment

1.3.1

  • Fix for plugin deployment

1.3.0

  • Design Popup Best Price
  • Checkout Page – Fix on the Spanish Translation
  • Checkout Page – The payment is visible only if there is at least one choice

1.2.0

  • Fix for plugin deployment

1.1.0

  • Support page

1.0.6

  • display bestprice module on product with price variations
  • Q/A in Spanish

1.0.5

  • Get pictures by plugin_url

1.0.4

  • Error on section page

1.0.3

  • Center Logo in product page for mobile device

1.0.2

  • Webhook headers lowercase

1.0.1

  • Design modal bestprice for theme full black

1.0.0

  • Version start
